description: Maitresse Madeline has a special toy: a living BDSM "Doll" (Miss Alyssah) that she takes out to play when she desires! She finds her dolly bound securely to her bed, just as she left her. She arrives and informs her that a play date awaits. Now properly prepared, our little dolly is taken to the dungeon and rigged as a marionette, complete with ballet point boots. Miss Alyssah takes full advantage of her role as "puppet master" and literally "pulls the strings", making her dolly dance, and bend to her will. Maitresse Madeline is so pleased with her diligent performance that her doll is rewarded with a magnificent orgasm. High performance art meets extreme BDSM eroticism in this film!
title: The Puppet Master
